name: Solace WIP
description:
Solace is a 2D Metroidvania set in the post-apocalyptic future. You play as Iris, a young girl who must traverse a broken, war-torn cityscape to confront the reality of her new existence. Find a resolution, and hopefully, in the end, gain solace.

We set too large of a scale and didn't end up finishing the game, but we had so much fun that we are going to continue developing it even after the Jam is over! Please look forward to it <3
